speaker: speaker1
text: Look at this headline , Soo Mi .

speaker: speaker2
text: Wow ! So many people in the United States get divorced !

speaker: speaker1
text: Is it the same in Korea ?

speaker: speaker2
text: I don't think so . In Korea some marriages break up , but most couples stay together .

speaker: speaker2
text: Not really . Very few people get married beforethe age of 20 .

speaker: speaker1
text: Hmm . Do women usually work after they get married ?

speaker: speaker2
text: No , a lot of women stay home and take care of their families . But some work .
